answers.answer: Hi,The hunger pangs, stomach and back pains and feeling sick all can be due to gastritis or heartburn of a severe kind. Dietary modification, bland diet and use of antacids should help. Frequent urination can be a pressure symptom due to the ovarian cyst or it can be due to urinary infection. Consult a Doctor for an evaluation. Hope this helps.The answer is based on information provided. Exact advice is not possible without a proper examination and investigations. You are requested to consult your Doctor. Take care and keep us posted.

Hello,Increased hunger is called polyphagia and it can be due to many causes.Please get your blood sugar (preferably GTT)done as polyphagia can be due to diabetes, diabetic ketoacidosis and hypoglycemic attacks.Also get your stool examination done as polyphagia can also be due to intestinal worms.It can be due to graves disease or hyperthyroidism also.Please consult a neurologist or endocrinologist for the confirmatory diagnosis.It is very difficult to precisely confirm a diagnosis without examination and investigations and the answer is based on the medical information provided. For exact diagnosis, you are requested to consult your doctor. I sincerely hope that helps. Take care and please do keep me posted on how you are doing.

question: Hey I am 18, female and I have an ovarian cyst but for the past couple of weeks on top of the cyst pain I have been getting really bad hunger pangs which happen at night I had to have a bowl of cereal before bed and then I woke up at 3:30am and had to have another then this morning at about 10 when I woke up again I did also! It hurts in the middle of my back near my shoulder and its really painful but also with normal hunger pangs in my tummy! I don't know what catagory this would be in so I chose this one! I also feel sick a lot and also I have to urinate a lot :/
title: bad hunger pangs I don't know why
